documentContentReferences.name: Schedule of Activities Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to the Schedule of Activities (SoA), Table 1, from the protocol amendment summary.

documentContentReferences.name: Screening Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from the amendment summary to Section 8 for details on procedures specific to screening sites in the US.

documentContentReferences.name: COVID-19 Vaccine Risk Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Section 10.5 for potential risks and mitigation measures due to COVID-19 vaccine.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to dose modification or discontinuation criteria in Section 6.6 for managing dose-dependent elevations in transaminases.

documentContentReferences.name: Investigator's Brochure Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to the Investigator’s Brochure (IB) for data on ALXN1840 studies.

documentContentReferences.name: Adaptive Features Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Table 4 for a description of adaptive design features and their limits.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Criteria Table Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: ALXN1840 Dose Modifications for Individual Participants
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Table 7 for criteria on when a dose should be decreased or interrupted.

documentContentReferences.name: Exclusion Criteria Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Section 5.2 regarding blood donation restrictions prior to screening.

documentContentReferences.name: Contraceptive Guidance Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Contraceptive Guidance and Collection of Pregnancy Information
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Section 10.4 for descriptions of appropriate contraceptive methods.

documentContentReferences.name: Pregnancy Discontinuation Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Section 8.2.6 regarding discontinuation from study intervention due to pregnancy.

documentContentReferences.name: QTc Withdrawal Criteria Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: DISCONTINUATION OF STUDY INTERVENTION AND PARTICIPANT DISCONTINUATION/WITHDRAWAL
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Section 7 for QTc withdrawal criteria and additional QTc readings.

documentContentReferences.name: Clinical Laboratory Tests Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Section 10.2 for the list of clinical laboratory tests to be performed.

documentContentReferences.name: AE/SAE Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Adverse Events: Definitions and Procedures for Recording, Evaluating, Follow-up, and Reporting
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Section 10.3 for procedures on recording, evaluating, follow-up, and reporting of AEs and SAEs.

documentContentReferences.name: Lost to Follow-up Definition
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to Section 7.3 for the definition of 'lost to follow-up'.

documentContentReferences.name: Figure 1 Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to the study schematic figure in the List of Figures.

commentAnnotations.text: To align the number of days with the mention of zinc discontinuation elsewhere in the protocol.
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: PROTOCOL AMENDMENT SUMMARY OF CHANGES TABLE

commentAnnotations.text: Abbreviations: ALT = alanine aminotransferase; AST = aspartate aminotransferase; IB = Investigator’s Brochure; PK = pharmacokinetics; WD = Wilson disease.
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Table 3: Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy

commentAnnotations.text: Dose range limit 15 mg every other day to 30 mg/day
Abbreviations: CRF = case report form; CRU = clinical research unit; EOS = End of Study; SoA = Schedule of Activities.
Abbreviations: ICF = informed consent form; PD = pharmacodynamic; PK = pharmacokinetic.

Note: total molybdenum and PUF molybdenum concentration-time profiles on Day 28 after the last 15 mg ALXN1840 dose will be extrapolated to Day 29 (0-24 hr) and subtracted from the observed Day 29 concentration-time profiles after the first 30 mg

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Protocol Amendment 3.1 (US) to clarify study procedures across different sites in the US.
